promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute strong fox dark-type pokemon wearing a golden mask. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or fox. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aurifoxim, a a chibi cute strong fox dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Deep Wind, Darkness Charge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "fox", "dark" or "Aurifoxim". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, fox-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: This mystical creature thrives in caverns, enchanting visitors with its Deep Wind and Darkness Charge. Often seen playfully bounding, it's small but mighty!
